title: Which font is that logo font?
content:
Please help me identify this logo font (used in the comic book of 2009). It resembles slightly Wagner Grotesk Pro (or Round Pro) but not the same. I guess it belongs to the slab-serif category.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014001532im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LILLIM_5334.jpg)
author: Lackadaisy

comments.content: Yes, exactly so! Thank you so much for help!
